title: What Prophet peace be upon him used to say after prayer
transcript: was it that the prophet has I'm used to do we all know that all the books of Sanaa say whenever the Prophet Isis am concluded the prayer he used to say hasta la la a Stoffel or a stone for allah allahumma anta salam wa minka salam tabarak the adelgid ally with a crumb and then he would turn his face to the congregation and gives his back to the Qiblah and
